```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(here)
library (plyr)
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(R.matlab)

## Sets R not to use scientific notations
options(scipen=999) 


```


## Read data
```{r}

physical_raw <- readMat(here::here("6.raw_data/Koweek et al_Physical_Data.mat"))

```

## Convert to DF
```{r}
## rbinds all objects on the list and keeps the list name as .id

# tube_num <- c("id", paste0("tube_", 1:5))

physical_df <- ldply (physical_raw, data.frame) %>% 
  select("id" = ".id", tube_1 = X1, tube_2 = X2, tube_3 = X3, tube_4 = X4, tube_5 = X5, one_var = "X..i..")
  
```
